content.content: Greetings, commanders! After a period of tensive development and testing, our new Website finally put into use.

A dedicated Tutorial page now walks newcomers through their first steps in COHP, while the new Units page lays out every stat in a side-by-side, easy-to-compare format so you can theory-craft at a glance.

We've also finished the jobs in internationalization support and a one-click theme switcher. In short, the site is built to give you the smoothest, most comfortable command experience we’ve ever offered.
We're still hard at work on the next wave of features and quality of user-experience upgrades. Here's what's next on the roadmap:

contents: A faster, smoother, “just-flows” feel across every click and scroll
More unit data fields shown in 'Units' page
An interactive armor-hit simulator: pick attacker, target, range, and see the damage odds instantly
